/usr/bin/c++    -fopenmp -lpthread -O3 -DNDEBUG  -march=native -fPIC -mtune=native   CMakeFiles/simple_bundle_adjuster.dir/simple_bundle_adjuster.cc.o  -o ../bin/simple_bundle_adjuster -rdynamic ../lib/libceres.a /usr/local/lib/libglog.so /usr/local/lib/libgflags.so -lcholmod -lccolamd -lcamd -lcolamd -lamd -llapack -lblas -lcxsparse -lgomp -lprotobuf -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib
